subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova routed Silvia Soler-Espinosa, 6-2, 6-1, in the opening singles match to give Russia a 1-0 lead over Spain in their Fed Cup first-round series in Moscow.
snippet: Maria Sharapova routed Silvia Soler-Espinosa, 6-2, 6-1, in the opening singles match to give Russia a 1-0 lead over Spain in their Fed Cup first-round series in Moscow.
